data.message: Thank you Facebook for helping me keep in touch with some of my favorite people. It's amazing how important family is.

replies.message: You're more than welcome, Joe! We love keeping you connected. -Jordan

Facebook   I think it's time we become dangerous.
“No society wants you to become wise, it is against the investment of all societies. If people are wise they cannot be exploited. If they are intelligent they cannot be subjugated, they cannot be forced in a mechanical life, to live like robots…They will have the fragrance of rebellion around them,,, https://www.facebook.com/freedominfonetwork/videos/823743750991010/
